message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $170.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. How about we meet in the middle at $155? I think it's a fair price for this unique product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $145? It's the best I can do.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $152? It's a bit of a compromise, but I think it's still a fair price for this product.
I'm getting close, but I still need to shave off a few more dollars. Can you consider $148? It's my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $155. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price for this unique product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so how about we try $151?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider one more time? I'm willing to go up to $149. That's my absolute limit.

I understand that you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $152. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price for this unique product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers again, so how about we try $150.5?
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not going to go above $150. I'll give you $150, and that's my final offer.
